Welcome!

This is the private workspace for participants in the 2017 Training Institute for Dissemination and Implementation Research in Health (TIDIRH) hosted by the National Cancer Institute. You can find the course materials and your small group discussion pages using the sidebar navigation. Please take a moment to familiarize yourself with the wiki.

Basic how-to information can be found here.

A short Website walk-through video can be watched here.

If you are accessing this Wiki on a mobile device (e.g. Apple iPad/ Android Tablet, etc.) the navigation links can be found by clicking the three-bar icon at the top left of your screen.
